page.title: 14SCHOOLS SAILING CENTRE
page.content: Open for 20 years ,the sailing centre has 4 full time instructors during the Summer,and stays open during the winter for boat maintenance,and middle school surveys,on the beach and harbour.C.S.E courses run for two years on sailing and navigation. Free school summer courses run, catering for 100 students a day .To go on a course you need to be able to swim 50 meters in light clothing .Life jackets or buoyancy aids are worn by all students on the water. The centre has 59 boats, 20 canoes and 15 windsurfs, the boats cost Â£1,500 each, but the centre builds most of its own boats out of fibre glass which is cheaper.The boats usually sail near the centre , but occasionally go to the Isle of Wight and Hayling Island. Private lessons run at weekends and during the evenings.
